articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Archery Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Archery Match
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, watched a match between the archery players of the April 25 Defense Sports Team and Amnokgang Defense Sports Team.
					 Prior to the match, he saw archery apparatuses of the players.
					
					 He called the players to come close to him and examined their bows and arrows with deep attention. He asked them which is good and bad in using them and about their impact on the results of matches in detail.
					
					 He said success largely hinges on what apparatus one uses in archery as the case is the same with all other sporting games, underscoring the need to provide best apparatuses to players.
					
					 He told officials to pay deep attention to archery events and take measures for the sufficient provision of such apparatuses as bow and arrow.
					
					 Then he watched an archery match between the April 25 Defense Sports Team and the Amnokgang Defense Sports Team.
					
					 First, he watched men and women's team matches.  
					
					 He praised the players whenever they hit bull's eyes in the targets, saying "Excellent." The players of the April 25 Defence Team won the team event.
					
					 Then he watched men and women's individual matches.
					
					 He was very satisfied whenever players got high marks. He said an archery game is an interesting and amusing one, adding that one feels exceptional pleasure when seeing a player hit the bull's eye in the target.
					
					 He said archery is just the same as shooting event. 
					
					 When Kang Un Ju of the April 25 Defense Sports Team gained 30 points by releasing three arrows, he appreciated her good archery. "She can give a good account of herself in an international game, too, with such skill," he added. 
					
					 Archers of the April 25 Defense Sports Team also won the individual event. 
					
					 He said that watching the matches, he came to have confidence that archers of the DPRK can surely emerge winners in international games including Olympics in the future. 
					
					 He stressed the need to round off the archery technique and tactical system of Korean style and scientific training methods to intensify the training and, at the same time, provide archers with archery apparatuses suited to their physical constitution. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that archers, coaches and officials of the April 25 Defense Sports Team and the Amnokgang Defence Sports Team would develop archery event and achieve good successes in international games. 
					
					 He had a picture taken with them. 
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Ri Yong Su, Kim Yong Hun and Ri Jong Mu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Goes Round Sports Village in Chongchun Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Goes Round Sports Village in Chongchun Street 
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the sports village in Chongchun Street. 
					 The village was built on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK under the wise leadership of the WPK. It is a comprehensive sports and cultural centre having gymnasiums, sports persons' restaurant, hotels and welfare service facilities. They can host various sports competitions of dozens of events including basketball, volleyball, table tennis, weightlifting and swimming events.
					
					 He toured the sports village with a plan to face-lift it as required by the new era because it has positively contributed to the country's development of sports and sports exchange with different countries.
					
					 He specified tasks and ways for remodeling the village, going round different gymnasiums, restaurants and hotels. 
					
					 He recollected with deep emotion the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by developing the Juche-oriented sports, saying that they took part in the ceremony for the completion of the sports village on Sept. 3, 1988. 
					
					 The first leg of his tour was the Basketball Gymnasium. 
					
					 Carefully seeing the floor and auditorium of the gymnasium, he gave instructions for remodeling it. 
					
					 Seeing the sporting hall and player-waiting room, he stressed the need to take proper measures for improving sound-arresting and heating devices and remodel all the facilities to meet the need of gymnasium. 
					
					 The next leg of his tour was the Table-Tennis Gymnasium. 
					
					 He learned in detail about the quality of tables in the gymnasium, stressing the need to provide players with better sports apparatuses. 
					
					 Saying that the luminous intensity is low, he stressed the need to reinforce lighting to suit games and watching. 
					
					 He said that the gymnasium should have sufficient facilities for indoor broadcasting. 
					
					 He dropped in at the Weightlifting Gymnasium. 
					
					 Going round the sporting hall, auditorium and player-waiting room, he stressed the need to remodel well the gymnasium so as to make weightlifting one of the successful events in the future, too.
					
					 It is important to make a good design for updating the gymnasium, he said, talking about the need to consult a lot of worldwide data on sports facilities before working it out. 
					
					 He looked round the sports persons' restaurant.
					
					 Going round eating rooms and kitchen, he learnt in detail about what kind of service players receive there, what kind of food they like best and the issues to be settled to improve the service at the restaurant.
					
					 There is nothing to spare for sports persons as they glorify the honor of the country at international games and bring national pride and self-confidence to the people, he noted, indicating ways to improve service to sports persons and took specific measures to do so.
					
					 He visited Sosan Hotel.
					
					 Looking round a restaurant and several rooms, he underscored the need to remodel the hotel as a modern one capable of providing good service to sports persons and spectators.
					
					 He specified tasks to officials concerned.
					
					 He said it is an important work for bringing about a radical change in sports of the country to successfully remodel the sports village as required by the era of Songun.
					
					 Saying that everything should be calculated carefully to update the village, he listened to views of sports officials.
					
					 He called for remodeling and face-lifting the inside and outside of the gymnasiums and providing them with modern sporting apparatuses and thereby glorifying the leadership feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the sports village.
					
					 He specified one by one issues arising in establishing a good system for managing sports facilities after remodeling the sports village and in ensuring the regular operation and management of the gymnasiums and their regular repair.
					
					 It is the firm resolution of the WPK to turn the country into a sports power and it is a sacred work for realizing the noble desire of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he said, expressing belief that the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports and the relevant fields would successfully remodel the sports village into a comprehensive sports and cultural centre impeccable in any aspect in a short period.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Ri Yong Su, Kim Yong Hun, Ryang Chong Song, Ma Won Chun and Ri Jong Mu.

articles.title: Aggressors Will Meet Destruction: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
Aggressors Will Meet Destruction: CPRK Secretariat
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released the information bulletin No. 1021 on Friday:
					 The army and people of the DPRK are poised for a final do-or-die battle in the spirit of annihilating enemies after the statement was made public by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military hooligans engrossed in confrontation and provocation are running reckless, unaware of the gravity of the situation and the ensuing catastrophic consequences.
					
					 On March 6, the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff let the chief of the operational department clarify south Korea's stand with regard to the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The military hooligans described the Key Resolve and Foal eagle war drills as "annual exercises for defense" and called the DPRK's crucial measures a "provocation". They even blustered that they would "severely punish even the commanding forces" of the north, adding that "they are bracing for putting it into practice."
					
					 They even bluffed that they would target the supreme headquarters of the Korean revolution, openly touting "punishing the commanding forces", a serious act of provoking an all-out war.
					
					 In April last year, they openly aired the footage of missile attack, calling for "striking the window of office in Pyongyang."
					
					 It is tragedy of the nation that the group of cursed traitors like Lee Myung Bak is still at large even though they deserve divine punishment for the heinous crimes they already committed against the nation.
					
					 The enemies of the nation who dare point their finger at the sky can never go scot-free.
					
					 It is the fixed determination of the army and people of the DPRK to certainly deal sledge-hammer blows at the group of traitors who seek to harm the headquarters of the revolution, which represents the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet military group dares make rhetoric, unaware that the stronghold of confrontation and treachery Chongwadae, and Seoul will be blown up at a time when they attempt "punishing the commanding forces of the north".
					
					 The DPRK solemnly stated to the world that from the moment when the Korean Armistice Agreement is nullified due to the moves for provoking a war of aggression by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers, the DPRK will mount Korean style strike of justice at the provocateurs without hesitation.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK, already put on a high alert, are waiting for an order for great advance for national reunification, determined to blast the strongholds of aggression with prompt and fatal retaliation, should the provocateurs make even the slightest move.
					
					 The reckless moves of the puppet warmongers for confrontation with the DPRK will accelerate their most miserable end.
					
					 Neither the U.S. nuclear umbrella which the puppet forces trust in as the savior nor international cooperation will be able to save the group of traitors to the nation.
					
					 The aggressors, provokers will meet a final ruin for provoking the DPRK for no reason.

articles.title: Important Measures to Defend Nation's Sovereignty, Dignity and Country's Supreme Interests: CPRK
articles.content:
Important Measures to Defend Nation's Sovereignty, Dignity and Country's Supreme Interests: CPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday issued the following statement:
					 The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army on Tuesday solemnly declared the important measures to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and the supreme interests of the country in view of the fact that the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' hostile acts and their nuclear war moves against the DPRK have reached a dangerous phase.
					
					 The measures were very just as they reflected the resolute disposition and iron will of the army and people of the DPRK to counter enemies coming in attack with a dagger with a sword, a rifle with an artillery piece and nukes with precision nuclear strike means of Korean style more powerful than them.
					
					  The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should have pondered over our warning.
					
					 However, they, hell bent on confrontation and war fever, illegally cooked up additional "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by using the hand-raising machine at the UN, while working hard to ignite a large-scale nuclear war against it.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean puppet forces are taking the lead in the moves for invading the DPRK, unaware of the disasters they will suffer like a tiger moth.
					
					  Even the puppet military warmongers unhesitatingly cried out for "resolutely destroying not only the bases of provocations and forces supporting them but their commanding forces" by brandishing the U.S.-provided nuclear stick against the DPRK over its just measures to defend the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 They were  so foolish as to let loose sheer sophism that the DPRK's important measures were a ploy to create "uneasiness" in south Korea and lead the situation to "dialogue." This is aimed to play down the DPRK's toughest stance.
					
					 Due to such evermore undisguised moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a war against it, the frozen north-south relations have gone beyond such the danger line that they are no longer repairable and an extremely dangerous situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula where a nuclear war may break out right now.
					
					 It is the steadfast determination and unshakable faith of the army and people of the DPRK led by the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu not to allow the hostile forces to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the country but decisively and mercilessly wipe them out.
					
					 Upon authorization, the CPRK clarifies the following countermeasures as regards the prevailing grave situation:
					
					 First, the DPRK abrogates all agreements on nonaggression reached between the north and the south.
					
					 The frantic Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the south Korean warmongers together with the U.S. in the land, air and seas of south Korea with huge armed forces, nuclear-powered carrier flotilla, strategic bombers and other nuclear strike hardware involved are open acts of aggression against the DPRK and a vivid expression of wanton violation of all the agreements on nonaggression reached between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are working with bloodshot eyes to invade the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. This situation reduced to dead papers the north-south agreements on nonaggression which calls for nonuse of force against the other party, prevention of accidental military clashes, peaceful settlement of disputes and the issue of nonaggression demarcation line.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK officially declares that from the moment the Korean Armistice Agreement is made totally invalid on March 11 all the said agreements will be completely nullified.
					
					 The DPRK will mercilessly punish the enemies through prompt crushing retaliatory strikes, not bound to the above-said agreements, if they intrude into its land and territorial air and waters even an inch and fire even a single shell at them.
					
					 Second, the DPRK totally nullifies the joint declaration on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal who introduced nuclear weapons to south Korea more than 60 years ago and has threatened the DPRK with nukes, spawning the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. The south Korean puppet forces are the accomplices who shielded and encouraged the U.S. shipment of nuclear weapons into south Korea and have danced to the tune of the U.S. in its moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces' nuclear war moves against the DPRK virtually put an end to the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula long ago and rendered the joint declaration on its denuclearization totally meaningless.
					
					 Hence, the DPRK re-clarifies that the joint declaration on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula has become totally invalid.
					
					 From now on, no one is allowed to utter such words as the DPRK's "dismantlement of nukes" and "no-use of nuclear weapons."
					
					 Moreover, the puppet forces have neither qualifications nor reason to urge the DPRK to dismantle nukes as they allowed the shipment of nukes into south Korea and have zealously participated in the moves for a nuclear war against it. 
					
					 Third, the DPRK will close the Panmunjom liaison channel between the north and the south.
					
					 There is nothing to talk to the puppet group of traitors hell-bent on the moves for a war of aggression against the north, blinded with confrontation and hostility towards compatriots. What remains to be done is to settle accounts with them by physical force only.
					
					 It is a mockery and insult to the noble Red Cross spirit to discuss compatriotism and humanitarian issues with those who consider confrontation with compatriots as a means for their existence. 
					
					 Moves for war and confidence-building cannot go together and showdown is incompatible with dialogue. It is illogical and nothing but hypocrisy to talk about "trust" and "dialogue" while pursuing confrontation and war. 
					
					 The DPRK declares the above-said channel closed from the view that this channel can no longer perform its mission due to the prevailing grave situation. It notifies the south side that, accordingly, it will immediately cut off the north-south hotline.
					
					 The hostile forces should clearly know that our just option is by no means a mere threat but is an expression of the fixed will of our army and people to annihilate the enemy.
					
					  All the service personnel and people of the DPRK will turn out as one and mercilessly wipe out the aggressors and provocateurs with the tremendous might of Songun they have consolidated, and build a reunified, prosperous and best powerful country on the land of three thousand-ri without fail.
					
					  We will never miss the golden chance to wage a great war for national reunification.

articles.title: National Peace Committee Memorandum Discloses U.S. History of Nuclear Threats to DPRK
articles.content:
National Peace Committee of Korea's Memorandum Discloses U.S. History of Nuclear Threats to DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The National Peace Committee of Korea released a memorandum Friday explaining how the nuclear issue spawned on the Korean Peninsula, who is the arch criminal of the nuclear threat and why the DPRK became to access the nuclear deterrence.
					 According to the memorandum, the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the nuclear threat directly posed to the DPRK by the U.S. which resorted to the war of aggression and hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The document goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, which provoked the war for aggression of Korea in June 1950, shipped nuclear weapons to south Korea in August that year and at the end of the year openly disclosed its plan to drop 30-50 A-bombs in Korea-China border areas.
					
					  Eisenhower, U.S. president-elect at that time, blustered on May 13, 1953 that it will be more beneficial to use an atomic bomb rather than conventional weapons in Korea when taking into account the financial aspect.
					
					 After it sustained a shameful defeat in the Korean war, the U.S. has viciously resorted to nuclear threats to the DPRK, pursuant to its moves for a new war.
					
					 The U.S. set out for nuclear weaponization of its forces present in south Korea. It reorganized its forces' division into Pentomic A-bomb Division equipped with tactical nuclear weapons and introduced Honest John nuclear missile battalion and 280 mm atomic artillery pieces battalion.
					
					 In 1958 the U.S. brought 588 tactical guided missile battalion of the U.S. air force and set up the 4th guided missile command of the U.S. forces.
					
					 Entering the 1960s, the U.S. renamed Pentomic A-bomb Division ROAD Division and introduced to south Korea atomic and guided weapons with various missions.
					
					 After the Vietnamese war in the mid-1970s, the U.S. declared south Korea as an area for defending front and pressed for the policy for turning south Korea into a nuclear base.
					
					  Member of the U.S. House of Representatives Ronald, speaking at a parliament, confessed that the U.S. shipped more than 1 000 nuclear weapons to south Korea and deployed 54 airplanes for carrying nuclear bombs.
					
					 In the 1980s the U.S. spurred the modernization of the nuclear hardware of its forces in south Korea.
					
					 Early in the 1980s the U.S. deployed 31 155mm nuclear shells, 133 nuclear bombs for air use, 63 nuclear shells for 8 inch howitzers and 21 nuclear land mines before any other base of its forces overseas.
					
					 South Korea turned into the world's biggest nuclear outpost with the stockpile of nuclear weapons such as bombs, shells, warheads, land mines and carrier means as well as nuclear bases and arsenals.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threats were vividly manifested in its open declaration to use nuclear weapons in Korea.
					
					 In January 1968 when the U.S. imperialists' armed spyship "Pueblo" was captured, the U.S. reviewed the nuclear attack plan. When the spy plane EC-121 was brought down from the sky above Korea in April 1969, the U.S. put tactical bombers mounted with nuclear weapons on standby and the then U.S President Nixon said that he approved the use of A-bomb in case Korea makes counterattack. 
					
					 When the Korean Peninsula was almost in the state of "emergency" in 2002, the U.S. made the preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK a fait accompli by granting the U.S. forces' first use of nuclear weapons. It even asserted that it will develop smaller nuclear weapons for destroying underground facilities.
					
					 The present Obama administration has steadily increased nuclear threats, putting the DPRK in the list of preemptive nuclear attack targets.
					
					 The U.S. at the 41st annual security consultative meeting in 2009 with the south Korean puppet forces made public a joint press release in which it promised the offer to south Korea of the nuclear umbrella, capacity for striking with conventional weapons, a missile shield and other extended deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. forces and the south Korean forces worked out a number of scenarios for invading the DPRK and pushed forward the moves to put big and annual joint military drills including Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian into an actual war every year.
					
					 The memorandum disclosed the south Korean puppet forces as a chieftain that increased the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and hampered the solution to the nuclear issue in league with the U.S.
					
					 The successive puppet regimes of south Korea connived at and encouraged the U.S. shipment of nuclear weapons to south Korea and actively joined the U.S. in its moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 In the 1980s, traitor Chun Doo Hwan in alignment with the U.S. brought to south Korea a neutron bomb called the "weapon of evil in the 20th century".
					
					 The puppet forces fully entrusted the U.S. with the right to use the nuclear weapons deployed in south Korea.
					
					 They formed the extended deterrence policy committee with the U.S. and agreed to hold exercises for using the extended deterrence means. Since 2011 they have put them into practice.
					
					 They have pushed forward the development of nuclear weapons in secrecy while taking an active part in the U.S. moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 The Park Chung Hee military dictatorial regime, in particular, laid out a nuclear weapons development plan and mulled processing nuclear fuel in 1969. It formed a nuclear and missile development team in 1974 and arranged nuclear fuel development area in 1976.
					
					 In September 1978, it test-fired ground to ground missile Paekgom capable of mounting nuclear warheads developed by the defense scientific research institute.
					
					 In November 1985, it completed the construction of a facility for extracting plutonium and put it into full operation from 1987.
					
					 South Korea directed efforts into the development of nuclear weapons delivery means as evidenced by the development of 256km range ground to ground missile Hyonmu capable of carrying out nuclear warheads and their deployment for an actual war in 1987.
					
					 It is openly calling for "nuclear weaponization" now.
					
					 It has viciously obstructed the negotiations for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Traitor Kim Young Sam resorted to the whole gamut of machinations to break down the DPRK-U.S. negotiations by currying favor with the U.S.
					
					 The cursed traitor Lee Myung Bak group threw hurdles in the way of the DPRK-U.S. talks, claiming that the "nuclear issue of the north" is destroying the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and obstructing  the efforts for the development of the south-north relations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group called the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch "a long-range missile launch" till the last moments of its office and worked with bloodshot eyes to materialize international "sanctions" citing the launch as a pretext.
					
					 The memorandum said that the DPRK's access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence was entirely attributable to the U.S. and its stooge south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The DPRK has constantly called for the withdrawal of the U.S. nuclear weapons since their shipment to south Korea and always maintained that the Korean Peninsula be denuclearized while working hard for the solution to the nuclear issue.
					
					 Far from responding to the DPRK's sincere efforts, the U.S. prodded some circles of the International Atomic Energy Agency to create sort of "discrepancy" of nuclear materials and forced the DPRK to receive special inspection. It also resumed Team Spirit joint military exercises and openly increased the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK has made sincere efforts for the settlement of the nuclear issue on the peninsula through direct talk with the U.S. directly responsible for the issue.
					
					 The DPRK's efforts for the peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue through dialogue have faced a serious challenge as junior Bush administration took power in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has remained unchanged under the present Obama government.
					
					 The Obama administration kicked up anti-DPRK nuclear racket, calling the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch that was recognized by international law "a long-range missile launch". This made the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula more serious one.
					
					 The situation eloquently proves that the DPRK was just when it decided to access nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear threats.
					
					 The memorandum warned that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should know that they will get nothing but destruction and disaster for their provocative anti-DPRK nuclear racket.

articles.title: Unhasu Concert Marks International Women's Day
articles.content:
Unhasu Concert Marks International Women's Day
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu Concert for marking the International Women's Day in 2013 was given in Pyongyang Friday.
					 Watching the concert were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state, women anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and their sons and daughters, woman deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly in Pyongyang, female officials of party and national institutions, exemplary officials of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and their spouses, heroines, those who had an audience with Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, scientists, teachers and researches and their husbands, women officials of industrial establishments and cooperative farms and labor innovators and their spouses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys and representative of international organizations and military attaches here together with their spouses.
					
					 The concert began with the National Anthem. It was given amid boundless reverence for the Generalissimos who hewed out the Korean women's movement and led it.
					
					 The repertoires included orchestral music and mixed chorus "Song of Women" and "Women are Flowers", female solo and female pangchang "Love of Great Mother" and a serial song "Song of Friendship".
					
					 The performers sang his praises of the undying feats of the great Generalissimos who put forward women as the powerful force of the revolution and construction and as full-fledged master of the country, and worked hard all their lives to materialize the cherished desire of women and usher in the new history of respecting women on this land.
					
					 Writer Yun Tu Gun loved by the people for creating a number of famous music and his wife, Tong Thae Gwan, member of the editorial desk of Rodong Sinmun who greatly inspired the army and people with powerful political essays, and his wife separately sang duets. This brilliantly decorated the stage of the concert.
					
					 Also put on the stage were "Song of Cheers" and world famous music.
					
					 The audience was greatly excited as numbers reflecting the will of the women to take powerful revenge on the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces and achieve the final victory of national reunification were presented.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: DPRK-Japan Joint Concert Given in Pyongyang
articles.content:
DPRK-Japan Joint Concert Given in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A concert of the State Symphony Orchestra conducted by Japanese Michiyoshi Inoue was given at the People's Theater on Friday.
					 The State Symphony Orchestra has a global reputation for its long history and talented conductors and players.
					
					 The joint concert given by the orchestra and the Japanese conductor's party consisting of international concours winners drew deep attention of the audience.
					
					 Among the audience were creators and artistes, teachers and students in the field of art education and members of the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Put on the stage were orchestral music "Arirang" and Beethoven's symphony No. 9 "Ode to Joy".
					
					  The performers impressively showed that the Koreans, who sang "Arirang", symbolic of sorrow of the stateless nation in the past, are leading a dignified life as independent people.
					
					 They made emotional and joyful presentation of Beethoven's symphony No. 9 "Ode to Joy".
					
					 As the climax of Beethoven's creations, the symphony composed in 1824 expresses mankind's delight and joy of victory with elegant and strong musical language.
					
					 The concert was applauded by the audience for the experienced and dynamic conduct by Japanese conductor Michiyoshi Inoue, musical supervisor of renowned symphony orchestras, the delicate and perfect representation by DPRK's players and the rich voice of singers.

articles.title: Science and Technology Festival Held
articles.content:
Science and Technology Festival Held
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The 28th Pyongyang Festival of Science and Technology took place at the Pyongyang Centre for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries from Mar. 4 to 7.
					 Present there were hundreds of scientists, technicians and other people and three-revolution team members who were highly estimated at several units.
					
					 The festival was divided into groups and individuals in forms of scientific and technological presentation, achievement exhibition and new technological exchange. Published there were more than 340 scientific and technological papers. Exchanges and technological services for new technological goods and varieties of cutting-edge goods from dozens of units were made in various forms.
					
					 Papers presented by participants of ten odd units including the Ryongsong Meat Processing Factory, the Central Plant Quarantine Station of the Ministry of Agriculture, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Mangyongdae Aeguk Aluminum Sash Factory and the Central District Fuel Station placed first at the scientific and technological presentation.
					
					 Varieties of goods produced by the New Technique Distribution Station of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory, etc. drew attention of the participants for their great significance in promoting the health of the people.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place provincial festivals.

articles.title: International Women's Day Significantly Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
International Women's Day Significantly Marked in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea set International Women's Day as a national holiday starting from this year.
					 An endless stream of women was seen paying floral tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang.
					
					 Priority is given to women at theatres and cinemas and in pleasure parks throughout the country.
					
					The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and other art troupes put on stage special programs exclusively arranged for women.
					
					 Okryu, Chongryu and other restaurants gave preferential service to women.
					
					 Flower and cosmetics shops were crowded with men and children demanding flagrant bouquets and kinds of cosmetics for their wives and mothers.
					
					 The hairpin counter at the Pyongyang Department Store No. 1 was teeming with women asking for "cosmos"-brand hairpins.
					
					 It has been a custom that husbands prepare special meals for families instead of their wives.

articles.title: DPRK Women Lead Worthwhile Life
articles.content:
DPRK Women Lead Worthwhile Life
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Women in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have led a worthwhile life under the care of the peerlessly great men.
					 On the occasion of International Women's Day, KCNA had an interview with Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK).
					
					 She said:
					
					 On this day, I recall the exploits the peerlessly great men performed to provide the Korean women with independent rights and happiness.
					
					 Soon after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung organized the DWUK and promulgated the Law on Sex Equality on July 30, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Under his warm care, the women grew up to be a reliable pillar for the country pushing one of the two wheels of the Korean revolution, while performing enormous feats in developing the country.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il authored a number of celebrated works on the women movement that serve as guidelines for the women to fulfill their duty for the times and history.
					
					 On March 8, 2008, he enjoyed an art performance together with women and gave them "Pomhyanggi"-branded cosmetics as gifts.
					
					 His loving care turned many women into "marathon queen", football stars, competent scientists and heroes.
					
					 The dignity and honor of the Korean women are being fully displayed under the care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On International Women's Day last year, he provided a peculiar concert for the women and gave hearty congratulations to them throughout the country.
					
					 He also saw to it that Mother's Day was instituted and initiated the 4th National Meeting of Mothers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Loving Care for Women
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Loving Care for Women
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- On International Women's Day, the Korean women are sorely missing leader Kim Jong Il, who had shown loving care for them in his lifetime.
					 Jong Yon Ok, management board chairwoman of the Yonan County Township Co-op Farm in South Hwanghae Province, told that Kim Jong Il was the benevolent father of all the people including the women.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il indicated the road for the women movement to follow in each period and stage of the revolution and wisely guided them to play a pivotal role in developing the country.
					
					 Whenever he met women during his field guidance, he highly appreciated their devoted service for the country and society and showed all sorts of solicitude for them.
					
					 In Juche 100 (2011) alone, the last year of his life, he personally met with a large number of women. Among them are cooks in Taehung Youth Hero Mine, called "Pyongyang girls", a biologist and a management board chairwoman, a weaver, a member of art groups of servicemen's families and an artiste. 
					
					 The song "My Wife" and "Pomhyanggi"-trademarked cosmetics are representations of his loving care for the women.
					
					 With such warm love and deep trust, he trained the women to be true revolutionaries and heroes of the times.
					
					 That is why the Korean women have devoted all their wisdom and energies to building a prosperous and powerful socialist nation, true to his noble intention.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Happy Women of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Happy Women of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women of the DPRK are the most dignified and happiest in the world as they lead their beautiful life enjoying the respect and blessing of all other people on a socialist land under the care of the great sun.
					 Rodong Sinmun in an editorial says this on Mar. 8.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The women are the flowers of society, the collective and families, and a powerful force of building a thriving nation.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established the new traditions of the Juche-based women's movement and created the Democratic Women's Union of Korea soon after Korea's liberation.
					
					 This was a great event that brought about a radical change in the destiny and position of the women who had been subject to social inequality and feudal fetters for centuries.
					
					 The President clearly indicated the way to be followed by the Korean women's movement in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution and warmly led them.
					
					 Thanks to his benevolent loving care, the women could become the powerful force pushing one of the wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, true to the President's intention, made sure that women were respected on this land by taking warm care of the women ranging from their political integrity to their life.
					
					 His love for the women can be illustrated by such facts as the state policies which were enforced even in the hard time, and maternity hospitals, nurseries and kindergartens built in different parts of the country.
					
					 Under the warm loving care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, a great many women became heroes of the times, labor innovators and women officials, and their noble traits and revolutionary stamina were fully displayed.
					
					 The Juche-oriented movement of the Korean women, which covered the course of victory and glory under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons, has greeted a new heyday as they are holding in high esteem the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 So admirable are the ideological and moral traits of the women who grew up under the loving care of the great Generalissimos, and are leading their worthwhile life under the loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the Korean women who are living as the roots of the country to bring up the standard-bearers of the times and the future of the revolution who can play their roles in the building of a thriving nation, fully determined to share the destiny with the party, revolution and socialism to the last.
					
					 The Party and country are very proud of having the large contingent of women revolutionaries who are very loyal to the Party and the leader and devoting themselves to society and the collective.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army is the thunderclap declaration of the just will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK all out in the struggle to defend the sovereignty in the face of the hostile forces' moves for invasion of it.
					 The moves being committed by the U.S. and other hostile forces over the DPRK's satellite launch and 3rd nuclear test have gone beyond the limit.
					
					 The U.S. is waging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear strike together with its south Korean puppet forces. Involved in the drills are the striking group of a nuclear carrier carrying over 100 nuclear warheads, B-52H, and the ground, naval and air striking means.
					
					 The reality in which the moves of the hostile forces to infringe on the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK have reached the dangerous stage is forcing all the servicepersons and other people to make a decisive decision.
					
					 The enemies are still running amuck quite ignorant of who their rival is.
					
					 It is the DPRK's mode of counteraction to wipe out the enemies coming in attack with rifles with artillery, and counter nuclear threats with precision nuclear striking means that have become further diversified.
					
					 The DPRK has only won victories in the fights for defending its sovereignty without making any concession.
					
					 The history of the country which covered the path of victory despite all sorts of trials and hardship clearly proves it.
					
					 As such events as the Fatherland Liberation War in the 1950s (Korean War), the accident of the U.S. spy ship "Pueblo", the accident of EC-121, the U.S. spy plane, and Panmunjom incident show, the army and people of the DPRK have emerged victorious in the standoff with the U.S.
					
					 Although the U.S. makes bluffing now, it can never provoke the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is neither the Balkans nor Iraq and Libya.
					
					 If they are going to deal with the DPRK with the arithmetical accounting for its territorial size, population and economic power and military capability, they will be fated to lose.
					
					 The DPRK is under the leadership of the illustrious commander born of Heaven and has the strength of single-minded unity of the people who are firmly rallied around him.
					
					 The human rifles and bombs ready to launch the showdown with the U.S. are waiting the order for a final attack.
					
					 They are fully ready to blast the stronghold of the U.S. imperialists and their allies on the earth.
					
					 The hostile forces are destined to meet the miserable fate from the moment the DPRK takes a new retaliatory measure.
					
					 They should always bear in the mind that they are standing at the critical crossroads.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Korean in Japan
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Korean in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, issued a statement on March 5 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for invading the DPRK.
					 The warmongers are working to mislead public opinion, describing the joint military exercises as "annual and defensive ones" but can never cover their nature, gravity and danger as ones for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies cooked up the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions", labeling the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes as a "long-range missile launch". They are also escalating military tension on the Korean Peninsula by taking issue with the DPRK over its third underground nuclear test.
					
					 Not content with this, they have kicked up the war maneuvers, undisguisedly revealing their attempt at preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 It bitterly condemned the unpardonable criminal act of pushing the situation to the brink of a nuclear war, urging the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop at once the reckless and criminal joint military exercises.

articles.title: DPRK-Targeted War Rehearsals Denounced by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
DPRK-Targeted War Rehearsals Denounced by S. Korean Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Peace against War of south Korea which consists of various organizations held a press conference in the area close to the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 5 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging the joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					 The organization said that the drills are apparently DPRK-targeted war rehearsals in the light of their scope and the nature of operational plans even though the south Korean and the U.S. authorities claim that they are "exercises for defense".
					
					 The organization went on:
					
					 The drills further stoke the tension as they are an actual war rehearsals in which various kinds of nuclear strike means including nuclear carrier are put to use.
					
					 It was already confirmed that "sanctions" and pressure can never solve contradiction, and the confrontation policy will only stir up military conflict and war.
					
					 The organization urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop joint military drills that will touch off an all-out confrontation, and follow through on the south-north joint declarations.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the organization held demonstration and a sit-in strike outside the U.S. embassy and "government" building.

articles.title: Halt to Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Demanded by Organizations of Koreans in Europe
articles.content:
Halt to Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Demanded by Organizations of Koreans in Europe
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held its general meeting in Berlin of Germany on March 3 and published a resolution.
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are aimed to destroy military bases and facilities of the north with latest war hardware and nuclear weapons and swallow up the whole of the north, the resolution said.
					
					 It strongly denounced the south Korean authorities for kicking off the war maneuvers for aggression against fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces.
					
					 The north-south relations which had dynamically advanced toward reunification through national reconciliation and cooperation were totally derailed by the Lee Myung Bak regime and there is no prospect for the solution, it noted.
					
					 The reality in which the south Korean authorities are intensifying suppression of the forces for reunification movement by invoking the "Security Law" is triggering off resentment of all Koreans in Europe who aspire after reunification, it said.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to stop the nuclear war maneuvers and opt for implementing the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in Russia Urges Japan Not to Crack down on Chongryon
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in Russia Urges Japan Not to Crack down on Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia released a statement on Feb. 27 to protest against the Japanese reactionaries' intensified crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defense.
					 The statement accused the Japanese reactionaries of having openly barred the visit to homeland by vice-chairmen of Chongryon, excluded the Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools and refused to subsidize the Korean schools in Kanagawa and Saitama prefectures.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' hostility towards Chongryon and Koreans in Japan amounts to abuses of human rights and violation of sovereignty that can never be justified in any case, said the statement, adding:
					
					 The Koreans residing in Japan are off-springs of those who were forcibly taken to Japan as draftees during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 Therefore, Japan is under legal and moral obligation to ensure the activities of Chongryon and the democratic national rights of the Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 However, it prohibited the visit to homeland by Chongryon's vice- chairmen and violated the children of Koreans' rights to national education, a move that can never be tolerated.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the Japanese authorities to refrain from violating the rights of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan and roll back their policy of national discrimination at once.

articles.title: Korean People Will Win Victory in Defending Sovereignty: German Organization
articles.content:
Korean People Will Win Victory in Defending Sovereignty: German Organization
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on March 1 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The statement said the DPRK's third underground nuclear test was a measure for self-defense to protect its sovereignty and the nation's dignity, adding:
					
					 The U.S. got UN Security Council to fabricate a "resolution on sanctions" charging the DPRK with the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, which touched off the Korean people's anger.
					
					 The DPRK regards the powerful nuclear deterrent as the only means for defending itself.
					
					 The statement expressed great concern that the war exercises may spill over into a war, but the U.S. and south Korea went ahead with the Foal Eagle joint war rehearsal.
					
					 This compelled the DPRK to declare that it would take strong countermeasures in succession to ensure the peace of the country.
					
					 The Korean people will win a victory in safeguarding the country's security and sovereignty and protecting peace in the Asian-Pacific region.

articles.title: "Sanctions" against DPRK Are Useless: Russian Figure
articles.content:
"Sanctions" against DPRK Are Useless: Russian Figure
						
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Georgy Toloraya, director of the Institute for Economy of the Russian Academy of Sciences, alleged that the new "sanctions" against the DPRK were unjust. He said this when he was interviewed by ITAR-TASS on March 6. 
					 If a "resolution" on the DPRK is adopted at the UN Security Council, the situation will deteriorate, the director said, and went on:
					
					 The adoption of the "resolution" will get the negative response from the DPRK including military reaction to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, new nuclear test and missile launch. 
					
					 Such a "resolution" will deteriorate the situation on the Korean Peninsula. It is better not to have such kind of "resolution."
					
					 What is clearer is that the "sanctions" will not be effective. 
					
					 The "sanctions" will be totally futile if they are aimed to seduce the DPRK into changing its acts. The "sanctions" will only worsen the situation. 
					
					 The worsening situation on the Korean Peninsula means a blow at the overall interests of Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a inspeccionar unidades de defensa de islas Jangjae y Mu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a inspeccionar unidades de defensa de islas Jangjae y Mu
						
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a inspeccionar la vispera la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae y la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu, radicadas en la zona mas candente del extremo sur del frente suroeste.
					Primeramente, el Mariscal estuvo en la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae, cerca de la isla enemiga Taeyonphyong.
					
					Recorriendo el cuartel y la sala de educacion de la unidad el atendio minuciosamente la vida de los uniformados.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, escucho el estado de modernizacion del lugar y el parte detallado sobre los blancos enemigos en la isla Taeyonphyong a ser destruidos por la unidad.
					
					Destacando que la isla Jangjae, situada en el extremo sur del frente suroeste, es uno de los puntos mas apreciados por el mismo, senalo que si se desencadena la batalla, los militares de la unidad deben cumplir un rol importante.
					
					Hay que perfeccionar los preparativos de combate para lanzar en cualquier momento los proyectiles cuando se de la orden, dijo y agrego que asestaran duramente y exterminaran a todos los enemigos si estos se atreven a disparar los canones hacia nuestras aguas y tierras jurisdiccionales.
					
					El Mariscal tomo la foto de recuerdo junto con los militares de la mencionada unidad y sus familiares.
					
					A continuacion, inspecciono la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, tras contemplar atentamente la isla enemiga Taeyonphyong recibio el parte de jefe de la unidad sobre la topografia y objetos terrestres, el estado de disposicion de efectivos de la unidad y preparativos  de combate.
					
					Reconfirmo en detalles nuevos medios de ataque de fuego y los objetos reforzados en 5 islas del Mar Oeste incluyendo la unidad enemiga de defensa del mar oeste de la isla Yonphyong y determino el turno y orden para el ataque a precision.
					
					Dado que los enemigos, estacionados en la cercania, se enfrascan al aumento de fuerzas armadas, dio las instrucciones detalladas sobre los asuntos de equipar satisfactoriamente la unidad con los armamentos, elevar la densidad de fuego a los objetos asignados e incrementar la proporcion de concentracion de fuego artillero. 
					
					Averiguo detalladamente los temas de enviar los medicos en tiempo de guerra y los planes de combates y operaciones aptos a la realidad de la unidad y tomo las medidas necesarias.
					
					Dijo que le satisfizo el estado de preparacion de combate de las citadas unidades.
					
					Como puntualice en la pasada inspeccion, esta zona deviene la zona maritima mas candente de la Peninsula Coreana, y al mismo tiempo constituye la mas sensible donde se concentra la atencion del mundo y estan enlazados los intereses de muchos paises, recalco.
					
					Ordeno a los militares de las mencionadas unidades a observar con alta vigilancia los movimientos de los enemigos, asestarles el inmediato contraataque demoledor si cae siquiera una sola bomba enemiga en la zona maritima y la tierra donde se ejerce la soberania de la RPDC y asi lanzar el primer canonazo y el cartucho de senales de la gran batalla por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados de las unidades del frente y otras fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y las unidades de cohetes estrategicos estan dispuestos a iniciar la guerra total a estilo coreano, acoto y expuso su determinacion de dar orden de iniciar el gran y justo avance para la reunificacion de la patria a lo largo de todos los frentes sin perder la oportunidad de oro si los enemigos vuelven a invadirnos siquiera una minima parte en la zona maritima sensible.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio con los militares de la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu y sus familiares.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il y An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a familiares de Ya. T. Novichenko
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a familiares de Ya. T. Novichenko
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 7 un mensaje de condolencias a los familiares de Ya. T. Novichenko.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Informado de la triste noticia de que fallecio lamentablemente la camarada Maria Evmenovna Novichenko, esposa del camarada Ya. T. Novichenko, amigo intimo del pueblo coreano y soldado internacionalista, expreso profundas condolencias a los familiares de la difunta.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP advierte a los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP advierte a los belicistas surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico en el dia de hoy la informacion no. 1021 que sigue:
					  Desde que tuvieron noticia de la recien publicada declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, todos nuestros militares y habitantes arden de animo de exterminar a los enemigos manteniendose en la disposicion para la batalla final de vida o muerte.
					
					  No obstante, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano, enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento y la provocacion, actuan todavia descabellados ignorando la gravedad de la situacion sin prever sus nefastas consecuencias.
					
					  El pasado dia 6, la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano publico por conducto del jefe del departamento operacional su posicion con respecto a la declaracion del portavoz de nuestra Comandancia Suprema.
					
					  En esa ocasion, los gangsteres militares surcoreanos justificaron sus ejercicios de guerra "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" como "entrenamientos anuales para la defensa".
					
					Para colmo, al cabo de calumniar como "actos provocadores" nuestras contramedidas importantes, dijeron que "castigaran fuerte y rotundamente hasta las fuerzas de mando" del Norte y "estan totalmente preparados para ello".
					
					El "castigo a las fuerzas de mando" significa que ellos tratan de tomar como blanco la Direccion Suprema de nuestra revolucion, lo cual es el peor acto encaminado a provocar la guerra total.
					
					En abril del ano pasado, ellos habian dado a la publicidad las imagenes de ataque de misiles hablando del "ataque por la ventana del despacho en Pyongyang".
					
					Es una tragedia nacional que existieran todavia los traidores de la calana de Lee Myung Bak que no podran evitar el castigo del cielo ya por los grandes crimenes cometidos en contra de la nacion.
					
					No pueden estar vivos los enemigos de la nacion que desafian al cielo.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo tienen la invariable decision de castigar sin falta a los traidores, que tratan de atentar contra nuestra Direccion de la Revolucion, maxima dignidad, persiguiendolos hasta el ultimo rincon.
					
					Acaso conoceran los gangsteres militares surcoreanos que al momento de intentar el "castigo a las fuerzas de mando del Norte", sera volada la abominable Chongwadae (Casa Azul), escondrijo de elementos conflictivos y traidores, y envuelta en llamas Seul?
					
					Ya hemos declarado solemnemente que a partir del momento de invalidacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea debido a las aventuras belicas anti-RPDC del imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos, asestaremos el ataque de justicia a nuestro estilo a los provocadores.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias esperan la orden de avance por la reunificacion de la patria manteniendose en el perfecto estado de movilizacion para reducir a cenizas los focos de agresion al abrir el fuego de represalia inmediato y demoledor cuando se detecte algun movimiento sospechoso de los provocadores.
					
					La irracional campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC acelerara cada vez mas el fin mas tragico de los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Ni el paraguas nuclear de EE.UU., considerado como Redentor por los titeres surcoreanos, ni la llamada cooperacion internacional podra salvarlos.
					
					Los agresores y provocadores pagaran con su arruinamiento definitivo el precio de haber provocado a la RPDC.

articles.title: CNCDP publica memorando sobre amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. a Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP publica memorando sobre amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. a Corea
						
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) publico el dia 8 un memorando revelando como surgio el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, cual es el que amenaza con armas nucleares y por que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tuvo que adquirir el disuasivo nuclear.
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana es originado por Estados Unidos que ejercio directamente la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC incurriendo en las maniobras de guerra y practicando la politica hostil contra ella, comienza el memorando y continua:
					
					El imperialismo yanqui, que habia provocado en junio de 1950 la guerra de agresion anti-RPDC, introdujo en agosto del mismo ano el arma nuclear y expuso abiertamente a finales del mismo ano el plan de lanzar 30-50 bombas atomicas hacia la region fronteriza Corea-China.
					
					Eisenhower, quien fue electo entonces como presidente norteamericano, peroro el 13 de mayo de 1953 que "segun calculos financieros, es mas conveniente el uso de armas nucleares que el de armas convencionales".
					
					El imperio, que fue derrotado en la guerra coreana, recrudecio la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC tratando de provocar nueva guerra.
					
					En julio de 1957, inicio el armamento nuclear de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y convirtio una division en la atomica asi como introdujo el batallon de misiles nucleares "Honest John" y el de canones atomicos de 280 mm de calibre.
					
					En 1958, introdujo en el territorio surcoreano el batallon de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos 588 de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas y fundo la comandancia de proyectiles teledirigidos no.4.
					
					En la decada de 1960, EE.UU. introdujo las armas nucleares y teledirigidas de distintos tipos.
					
					A mediados de la decada de 1970, despues del fin de la guerra vietnamita, el imperio definio el territorio surcoreano como la region de defensa del frente e impulso en etapa crucial la conversion del Sur de Corea en una base nuclear.
					
					En la decada de 1980, EE.UU. acelero la modernizacion de armamentos nucleares de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					
					A principios de la decada de 1980, ubico en las tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea 31 bombas nucleares de 155mm, 133 bombas nucleares aereas, 63 obuses nucleares para el canon de tiro parabolico con un calibre de 8 pulgadas y 21 minas nucleares que no fueron suministradas hasta entonces a ninguna otra base en el extranjero.
					
					El Sur de Corea se convirtio en una base avanzada nuclear mas grande en el mundo donde estan amontonadas las bombas nucleares, los obuses nucleares, las ojivas nucleares, las minas nucleares y los medios de transporte de armas nucleares, las bases nucleares y los almacenes nucleares.
					
					A traves de la declaracion abierta de EE.UU. de usar las armas nucleares contra la RPDC, se puso al desnudo nitidamente la amenaza nuclear del imperio contra esta.
					
					En enero de 1968 cuando fue capturado el barco espia norteamericano "Pueblo", se reviso el ataque nuclear y en abril de 1969 cuando fue derribado el avion espia "EC-121" en el aire jurisdiccional de Corea, Nixon, presidente estadounidense de aquel entonces hizo preparar en estado de alerta los bombarderos tacticos cargados de armas nucleares y "aprobo el uso de la bomba atomica si la RPDC emprende el contraataque".
					
					En 2012, cuando fue creado en la Peninsula Coreana un "estado emergente", el imperialismo norteamericano expuso la voluntad de que sus tropas usarian primero las armas nucleares y en este caso desarrollaria las armas nucleares de pequeno tamano capaces de destruir las instalaciones subterraneas, asi que  se hizo un hecho consumado el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					La actual administracion de Obama, tras tomar la RPDC como blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear, intensifica cada dia mas la amenaza nuclear.
					
					En 2009, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos publicaron oficialmente en la declaracion conjunta aprobada en la 41a reunion consultiva anual de seguridad el ofrecimiento de la paraguas nuclear y las fuerzas disuasivas a la proliferacion entre otras la capacidad de ataque convencional, el sistema antimisil por parte del imperio al Sur de Corea. .
					
					Tras disenar numerosos planes de guerra de agresion al Norte, las tropas norteamericanas y el ejercito titere del Sur de Corea dieron acicate a los preparativos para llevarlos a la practica a traves del desarrollo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos inclusive "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					
					El memorando revela ademas que los titeres surcoreanos son autores principales que junto con EE.UU. trajeron a la Peninsula Coreana el peligro de guerra nuclear e impidieron la solucion del problema nuclear.
					
					Todos los poderes titeres del Sur de Corea toleraron y fomentaron la introduccion de las armas nucleares  norteamericanas al Sur de Corea y tomaron activa parte en las maniobras de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					En la decada de 1980, el traidor Chun Doo Hwan conspiro con EE.UU. para introducir antes que nadie al Sur de Corea la bomba N. conocida como el "arma de diablos del siglo XX".
					
					Los titeres encargaron al imperio todo el derecho de uso de armas nucleares ubicadas en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Luego de acordar junto con su amo norteamericano la organizacion de la Comision para Disuasivo de Proliferacion Nuclear y el desarrollo de  ejercicios para uso de medios de disuasivo de proliferacion nuclear, desde 2011 los llevo a la practica.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos se sumaron a las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., mientras promovieron en secreto el desarrollo de  armas nucleares.
					
					Sobre todo, el "poder" militar y dictatorial de Park Chung Hee, al trazar el ambicioso plan de desarrollo de arma nuclear, planeo en 1968  reprocesamiento de combustible nuclear y en 1974, organizo el grupo de desarrollo de misil nuclear y la zona de desarrollo de combustible nuclear.
					
					En septiembre de 1978, realizo la prueba de lanzamiento del misil tierra-tierra capaz de cargar ojiva nuclear, desarrollado por el instituto de ciencia de defensa nacional.
					
					En noviembre de 1985, completo las instalaciones capaces de extraer plutonio y las puso en pleno funcionamiento desde 1987.
					
					Por otra parte, los titeres surcoreanos concentraron sus esfuerzos en el desarrollo de los medios de transporte de armas nucleares, tales como el emplazamiento para el combate en 1987 de los misiles tierra-tierra "Hyonmu" de 256 km de alcance.
					
					En estos dias, ellos reclaman abiertamente la teoria de "armamento nuclear".
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos obstaculizaron obstinadamente las negociaciones para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En particular, la banda de Kim Young Sam  recurrio a todos los medios para frustrar las negociaciones RPDC-EE.UU. instigando  a este imperio.
					
					La camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak puso toda clase de estorbos a las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU. diciendo que el "problema nuclear del Norte" vulnera la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana e impidio el desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte.
					
					Y hasta el ultimo periodo de su mandato, se enfrasco en poner en practica la "sancion" internacional estigmatizando el lanzamiento de satelite coreano con fines pacificos de "lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance".
					
					La posesion del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC se debe enteramente  a Estados Unidos y sus titeres surcoreanos.
					
					La RPDC ha venido esforzandose mucho por la solucion del problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana  insistiendo  invariablemente  en la retirada de armas atomicas y  la desnuclearizacion de esta zona desde cuando se introdujeran esos artefactos norteamericanos en el suelo surcoreano.
					
					En vez de responder a los sinceros empenos de la RPDC, el imperio  invento la llamada "disparidad" de las sustancias nucleares e impuso la inspeccion especial instigando a algunos elementos de la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica. Y se puso mas desafiante a la primera al ejercer mas abiertamente la amenaza de guerra nuclear mediante la reanudacion del simulacro militar conjunto "Team Spirit".
					
					La RPDC ha venido trabajando sinceramente por la solucion pacifica del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana mediante las conversaciones directas con EE.UU.
					
					Pero, tales esfuerzos enfrentaron a los graves retos desde cuando  apareciera la administracion norteamericana de Bush II.
					
					La politica hostil anti-RPDC se repite en el regimen de Obama. 
					
					La administracion Obama armo escandalo nuclear anti-RPDC cuestionando hasta el lanzamiento de satelite con fines  pacificos, reconocido por la ley internacional, como "disparo de misil de largo alcance", de manera que el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana  se tornara cada dia mas delicado.
					
					La realidad de hoy demuestra cuan justa es la posesion del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo por la RPDC frente a la amenaza nuclear del imperio.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que buscaran con la campana nuclear anti-RPDC solo la bancarrota de si mismos y los provocadores seran los mas perjudicados.

articles.title: No perderemos la oportunidad de reunificacion de la patria, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
No perderemos la oportunidad de reunificacion de la patria, advierte CRPP 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 8 la siguiente declaracion: 
					El pasado dia 5, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea aclaro las medidas importantes para defender la soberania y dignidad nacionales y los maximos intereses del pais con respecto a que llegan a la etapa peligrosa los actos hostiles y las maniobras de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Esas justas medidas reflejan el temperamento y la ferrea voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de responder al punal con la espada, al fusil con el canon y a la amenaza nuclear con los mas poderosos medios de ataque nuclear a precision al estilo coreano. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos debieron aceptar con prudencia nuestra advertencia. 
					
					Pero, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos enloquecidos por el fervor de guerra y de confrontacion intensificaron mas las maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de grandes dimensiones y, al mismo tiempo, volvieron a fabricar por fin la "resolucion de sancion" adicional anti-RPDC movilizando hasta la maquinaria de votacion de la ONU. 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que los titeres surcoreanos actuan como brigada de choque en esas maniobras de agresion anti-RPDC sin tener en consideracion los desastres que sufriran ellos mismos. 
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana dicen atrevidamente que "atacaran no solo la fuente de provocacion y las fuerzas de su apoyo sino tambien las fuerzas de mando" censurando nuestras justas medidas para defender la soberania de la nacion. 
					
					Ademas, se atreven a manchar nuestra voluntad intransigente diciendo que las medidas importantes de la RPDC son una artimana para "crear la inestabilidad" en el Sur de Corea y "conducir al dialogo". 
					
					Debido a las cada dia mas siniestras maniobras de enfrentamiento y de guerra contra la RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana, las relaciones intercoreanas ya destruidas llegan a la fase nunca remediable y en la Peninsula Coreana se crea una situacion muy tirante a punto de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo, guiados por el Comandante Insigne del monte Paektu, tienen la firme decision e invariable conviccion de aniquilar despiadadamente las maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles que infringen la dignidad y soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Con respecto a la grave situacion actual, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria expone por encargo las siguientes contramedidas:
					
					Primero, cancelamos todos los acuerdos de no agresion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" que los belicistas titeres del Sur de Corea desarrollan junto con EE.UU. en la tierra, el cielo y el mar movilizando a los enormes efectivos, flotilla de portaaviones nuclear, bombarderos estrategicos y otros medios de ataque nuclear, siendo una accion abierta de agresion contra la RPDC, son una demostracion concentrada del acto destructivo que revuelca todos los acuerdos de no agresion entre las ambas partes.
					
					Dado que en contubernio con EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos se desesperan para agredirnos, se han hecho invalidos los acuerdos de no agresion N-S, entre otros, el no uso de las fuerzas armadas contra su contraparte, la detencion de eventual choque militar, la solucion pacifica de conflictos y el asunto de linea de demarcacion de no agresion.
					
					Por lo tanto, declaramos oficialmente que seran anulados tambien todos los acuerdos de no agresion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea desde el 11 de marzo en que se invalidara totalmente el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea.
					
					Castigaremos sin piedad a los enemigos con el inmediato y demoledor ataque de represalia liberandonos de los acuerdos de no agresion si estos invaden lo minimo de nuestro territorio, cielo y mar.
					
					Segundo, anularemos totalmente la declaracion conjunta sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. es el autor principal que ya desde hace mas de 60 anos, introdujo al Sur de Corea armas nucleares y genero el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana amenazando con armas nucleares a la RPDC y los titeres surcoreanos son complices que ampararon y fomentaron la introduccion de armas nucleares de EE.UU. y se sumaron a las maniobras de guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte.
					
					Debido a las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea contra la RPDC, ya hace mucho tiempo se acabo la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la declaracion conjunta al respecto no tenia ningun valor.
					
					Bajo tal circunstancia, declaramos una vez mas que ya ha sido anulada la declaracion conjunta sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Desde ahora, nadie debe demandarnos la "renuncia nuclear" ni el "no uso de armas nucleares".
					
					La banda de los titeres, que tomo activa parte en la introduccion de armas nucleares y las maniobras de guerra nuclear contra el Norte, no tiene la calificacion de exigirnos renunciar las armas nucleares. 
					
					  Tercero, cancelaremos la comunicacion por via Phanmunjom entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea. 
					
					  No tenemos nada que hablar con la banda de los traidores surcoreanos que enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida con la conciencia hostil a la parte connacional se entregan a las maniobras de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC y nos queda solo la cuenta apoyada en la fuerza fisica. 
					
					  Discutir el tema de amor fraternal y el de humanitarismo con quienes consideran la confrontacion fratricida como el medio de vida es una burla e insulto al noble espiritu de la cruz roja. 
					
					  Son incompatibles la campana de guerra y el establecimiento de la confianza, la confrontacion y el dialogo.
					
					  Hablar de la "confianza" y el "dialogo" persiguiendo la confrontacion y la guerra no pasa de ser una hipocresia. 
					
					  Considerando que en la situacion actual la comunicacion por via Phanmunjom no puede cumplir mas con su mision, declaramos su cancelacion y avisamos que interrumpamos de inmediato el telefono directo Norte-Sur. 
					
					  Nuestra opcion justa no es una simple amenaza sino la explosion de la voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					  Las fuerzas hostiles deben tenerlo presente. 
					
					  Todos los militares y civiles de la RPDC aniquilaran implacablemente a los invasores y provocadores con el inagotable poderio del Songun consolidado hasta ahora y levantaran sin falta sobre el territorio de tres mil ries el pais reunificado, prospero y mas potente en este mundo.
					
					  No perderemos jamas la buena oportunidad de la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
